Reference

Teal Core Functions

These are the main functions needed to build a teal app.

init()

Create the Server and UI Function For the Shiny App

module()

Create a module with a new shiny page

modules()

Create a collection of module and modules object

root_modules()

Create the root modules container

toString(<teal_module>)

Convert teal_module to a string

toString(<teal_modules>)

Convert teal_modules to a string

Teal Filtering and Selecting

Functions used to filter observations and select variables from dataset.

add_no_selected_choices()

Add empty choice to choices selected

choices_labeled()

Set "<choice>:<label>" type of Names

choices_selected()

Choices Selected

data_extract_spec()

Data Extract input for teal modules

filter_spec()

Data extract filter specification

get_variable_labels()

Function that extract column labels from CDISC dataset

is.choices_selected()

Check if an object is a choices_selected class.

select_spec()

Column selection input specification

value_choices()

Wrapper on choices_labeled to label variable values basing on other variable values

variable_choices()

Wrapper on choices_labeled to label variables basing on existing labels in data

Teal modules UI

Functions used to filter observations and select variables from dataset.

optionalSelectInput()

Hide, Show Label only or display a pickerInput

optionalSliderInput()

if min or max are NA then the slider widget will be hidden

optionalSliderInputValMinMax()

For teal modules we parameterize an optionalSliderInput with one argument value_min_max

updateOptionalSelectInput()

Update optionalSelectInput

cdisc_dataset()

cdisc_dataset_file()

Load CDISCDataset object from a file

For creating delayed dataset objects.

Open connection to rice

Open connection to Teradata

Delayed Data Constructors

For creating delayed data objects.

Data input for teal app

Delayed Dataset Functions

For loading and modifying delayed data objects.

as_cdisc()

Convert a Dataset(Connector) object to a CDISCDataset(Connector) object

callable_code()

Create CallableCode object

callable_function()

Create CallableFunction object

get_attrs()

Get dataset attributes

get_cdisc_keys()

Function that returns the default keys for a CDISC dataset by name

get_code()

Get code

get_dataname()

S3 method for getting a dataname(s) of (DataAbstract, (DatasetConnector or Dataset) R6 object

get_dataset()

Get dataset from DatasetConnector

get_dataset_label()

S3 method for getting a label of (DatasetConnector or Dataset) R6 object

get_datasets()

Get a Dataset objects.

get_keys()

Get dataset primary keys

get_raw_data()

Retrieve raw data

is_pulled()

Is pulled

load_dataset()

Load data from connection

load_datasets()

Load datasets

mutate_data()

Mutate data by code

mutate_dataset()

Mutate dataset by code

mutate_join_keys()

Mutate JoinKeys with a new values

resolve_delayed()

Resolve delayed inputs by evaluating the code within the provided datasets

resolve_delayed_expr()

Resolve expression after delayed data are loaded

set_args()

Set arguments of a CallableFunction

set_keys()

Set dataset primary keys

Helpers

Other useful functions for users and developers.

Make a Shiny UI function bookmarkable

data_label()

Get dataset label attribute

`data_label<-`()

Set dataset label attribute

default_filter()

Refer to the default filter state

get_filter_expr()

Get filter expression for multiple datanames taking into account its order.

get_labels()

Function that extract labels from CDISC dataset

get_key_duplicates()

S3 generic for creating an information summary about the duplicate key values in a dataset

get_key_duplicates(<Dataset>)

Creates a short information summary about the duplicate primary key values in a dataset

get_key_duplicates(<data.frame>)

Creates a short information summary about the duplicate key values in a dataset.

join_key()

Create a relationship between a pair of datasets

join_keys()

Create a JoinKeys out of a list of JoinKeySet objects

log_app_usage()

Teal Application Usage Logging.

no_selected_as_NULL()

Check select choices for no choice made

print(<choices_labeled>)

Print choices_labeled object

Print teal_module

print(<teal_modules>)

Print teal_modules

python_code()

Python Code

read_script()

Read .R file into character

run_js_files()

Run JS file from /inst/js/ package directory

split_by_sep()

Split by separator

stop_shiny()

Stop app.R evaluation with a Jumbotron Shiny App

`%is_in%`

List element in other list

For Developers

R6 Classes

Abstract and concrete classes used to build teal functionality.

FilteredData

Class to encapsulate filtered datasets

CDISCFilteredData

Class to encapsulate relational filtered datasets with its parents.

Dataset

R6 Class representing a dataset with its attributes

CDISCDataset

R6 Class representing a dataset with parent attribute

DatasetConnector

A DatasetConnector class of objects Objects of this class store the connection function to fetch a single dataset. Note that for some specific connection types (e.g. RICE or SAICE), an object of class DataConnection must be provided. Data can be pulled via the pull method and accessed directly through the dataset active binding. Pulled data inherits from the class Dataset

CDISCDatasetConnector

A CDISCDatasetConnector class of objects Objects of this class store the connection function to fetch a single dataset. The difference compared to the inherited class is a parent field that indicates name of the parent dataset. Note that the parent field might be empty (i.e. character(0)).

DataConnection

A DataConnection class of objects Objects of this class store the connection to a data source. It can be a database or server (RICE or SAICE) connection.

DataAbstract

DataAbstract class

RelationalData

Manage multiple RelationalDataConnector, DatasetConnector and Dataset objects.

CDISCData

Manage multiple CDISCDataConnector, CDISCDatasetConnector and CDISCDataset objects.

RelationalDataConnector

Manage multiple and DatasetConnector of the same type.

CDISCDataConnector

Manage multiple and DatasetConnector of the same type.

Callable

A Callable class of objects Object that stores function name with its arguments. Methods to get call and run it.

CallableCode

A CallableCode class of objects Object that stores code to reproduce an object. It includes methods to get or run the code and return the object.

CallablePythonCode

A CallablePythonCode class of objects

CallableFunction

A CallableFunction class of objects Object that stores function name with its arguments. Methods to get call and run it.

CodeClass

Code Class

PythonCodeClass

A CallablePythonCode class of objects

JoinKeys

R6 Class to store relationships for joining datasets

srv_teal_with_splash()

Server function that loads the data through reactive loading and then delegates to srv_teal.

ui_teal_with_splash()

UI to show a splash screen in the beginning, then delegate to srv_teal

Unexported Functions

These functions are useful for teal developers.

check_in_range()

Check that a given range is valid

check_in_subset()

Check that one set is a subset of another

check_pkg_quietly()

Check if package can be loaded

check_setequal()

Check that two sets are equal and informative error message otherwise

code_exclude()

Exclude from code

code_from_script()

Get code from script

enclosed_with()

Get code enclosed within

enclosed_with_dataname()

Get code enclosed within

extract_choices_labels()

Extract labels from choices basing on attributes and names

extract_raw_choices()

Extract raw values from choices

filter_state_to_str()

Print the state in a nice format

find_source_code()

Finds lines of code with source call

get_client_timezone()

Get Client Timezone

get_code_single()

Get code

get_filter_vars()

Get filter variable names that are currently active

handle_active_datanames()

When active_datanames is "all", sets them to all datanames otherwise, it makes sure that it is a subset of the available datanames

include_css_files()

Include CSS files from /inst/css/ package directory to application header

include_js_files()

Include JS files from /inst/js/ package directory to application header

include_source_code()

Includes source in preprocessing code lines

include_teal_css_js()

Code to include teal CSS and Javascript files

label_to_id()

Turn a label into a valid html id, prefix a string

modules_depth()

Get module depth

picker_options()

Create choicesOpt for pickerInput

picker_options_content()

Optional content for optionalSelectInput

pretty_code_string()

Format a vector of code into a string

srv_add_filter_variable()

Server function to add a filter variable to datasets

set_single_filter_state()

Set the filter state for a single variable

srv_filter_items()

Server function to display filters for a dataset

srv_filter_panel()

Server function for filter panel

srv_filter_overview()

Server function to display the number of patients in the filtered and unfiltered data

srv_nested_tabs()

Server function that returns currently active module

srv_shiny_module_arguments()

Function to inherit Shiny module arguments that must always be present

srv_single_filter_item()

Server function to filter for a single variable

srv_tabs_with_filters()

Server function

srv_teal()

Server function corresponding to teal

topological_sort()

Topological graph sort

text_to_call()

Create call from string

ui_add_filter_variable()

UI to select among the column names of a dataset to add as a filter variable

ui_filter_items()

Creates UI to show currently selected filters that can be applied to a single dataset, i.e. all columns selected for filtering are shown.

ui_filter_overview()

Creates the UI for the module showing counts for each dataset contrasting the filtered to the full unfiltered dataset

ui_filter_panel()

Module for the right filter panel in the teal app with a filter overview panel and a filter variable panel.

ui_nested_tabs()

Create a UI of nested tabs of teal_modules

ui_single_filter_item()

UI to filter a single filter variable

ui_tabs_with_filters()

Add right filter panel into each of the top-level teal_modules UIs.

ui_teal()

Teal app UI

variable_type_icons()

Get icons to represent variable types in dataset

variable_types()

Get classes selected columns from dataset
